# ABAddressBook

**Type Alias**

A reference to an ABAddressBook object.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ABAddressBook = CFTypeRef
```

## Finding Participant Address Book Records

- **abRecord(with:)**: Returns the address book record that represents the participant.
- **abPerson(in:)**: Returns the address book record that represents the participant.
- **ABRecord**: A reference to an ABRecord object or any of its derivedopaque types.

items.description: Returns the address book record that represents the participant.
